nodeList.loreText: Call to the forest and it will call back to you in the howls of the wolves
nodeList.nodeDescription:
Summons a primal wolf that follows you into combat. Resistant to powerful area attacks.

The wolf counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.

nodeList.description: Your wolves have additional dodge chance, and have increased dodge rating for each point of strength you have.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
Your wolves have [30] additional dodge rating per point

Your wolves' dodge rating is increased by [3%] for each point of Strength

node.loreText: Call to the forest and it will call back to you in the howls of the wolves
node.nodeDescription:
Summons a primal wolf that follows you into combat. Resistant to powerful area attacks.

The wolf counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.

nodeList.description: Wolves have a chance to cause enemies to bleed with their melee attacks.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Wolves have [25%] chance per point to inflict bleeding on hit with melee attacks

node.description: Your wolves have additional dodge chance, and have increased dodge rating for each point of strength you have.
node.nodeDescription:
Your wolves have [30] additional dodge rating per point

Your wolves' dodge rating is increased by [3%] for each point of Strength

node.loreText: Call to the forest and it will call back to you in the howls of the wolves
node.nodeDescription:
Summons a primal wolf that follows you into combat. Resistant to powerful area attacks.

The wolf counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.

node.description: Bleed inflicted by wolves lasts longer and wolves have a chance to slow on hit and when hit.
node.nodeDescription: Wolves gain [50%] more damage over time per point (multiplicative with other bonuses).

node.description: You can summon wolves up to your maximum number of companions.

node.altText: Recently refers to the past 4 seconds
node.description: Wolves have more damage and dodge rating (multiplicative with other modifiers). This bonus is tripled for wolves that have howled recently.
Wolves have increased attack and move speed.
node.nodeDescription: Wolves have [10%] increased attack speed and movement speed per point

node.loreText: Call to the forest and it will call back to you in the howls of the wolves
node.nodeDescription:
Summons a primal wolf that follows you into combat. Resistant to powerful area attacks.

The wolf counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.

nodeList.description: Wolves deal more bleed damage and damage over time (both multiplicative with other modifiers).
nodeList.nodeDescription: Wolves gain [50%] more damage over time per point (multiplicative with other bonuses).

node.description: Wolves have a chance to cause enemies to bleed with their melee attacks.
node.nodeDescription: Wolves have [25%] chance per point to inflict bleeding on hit with melee attacks

node.description: Your wolves have additional dodge chance, and have increased dodge rating for each point of strength you have.
node.nodeDescription:
Your wolves have [30] additional dodge rating per point

Your wolves' dodge rating is increased by [3%] for each point of Strength

node.loreText: Call to the forest and it will call back to you in the howls of the wolves
node.nodeDescription:
Summons a primal wolf that follows you into combat. Resistant to powerful area attacks.

The wolf counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.

node.description: Bleed inflicted by wolves lasts longer and wolves have a chance to slow on hit and when hit.
node.nodeDescription: Wolves gain [50%] more damage over time per point (multiplicative with other bonuses).

node.description: You can summon wolves up to your maximum number of companions.

node.altText: Recently refers to the past 4 seconds
node.description: Wolves have more damage and dodge rating (multiplicative with other modifiers). This bonus is tripled for wolves that have howled recently.
Wolves have increased attack and move speed.
node.nodeDescription: Wolves have [10%] increased attack speed and movement speed per point

node.loreText: Call to the forest and it will call back to you in the howls of the wolves
node.nodeDescription:
Summons a primal wolf that follows you into combat. Resistant to powerful area attacks.

The wolf counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.

nodeList.description: Wolves have increased attack and move speed.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Wolves have [10%] increased attack speed and movement speed per point

node.loreText: Call to the forest and it will call back to you in the howls of the wolves
node.nodeDescription:
Summons a primal wolf that follows you into combat. Resistant to powerful area attacks.

The wolf counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.

nodeList.description: Wolves deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).
nodeList.nodeDescription: Wolves deal [15%] more damage per point (multiplicative with other bonuses).

node.loreText: Call to the forest and it will call back to you in the howls of the wolves
node.nodeDescription:
Summons a primal wolf that follows you into combat. Resistant to powerful area attacks.

The wolf counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.

nodeList.description: Your wolves' melee hits deal more damage, and have a greater chance to stun and critically strike enemies (all multiplicative with other modifiers).
nodeList.nodeDescription: Your wolves melee attacks have [15%] more damage, stun chance, and crit chance per point (multiplicative with other bonuses).

node.description: Wolves deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).
node.nodeDescription: Wolves deal [15%] more damage per point (multiplicative with other bonuses).

node.loreText: Call to the forest and it will call back to you in the howls of the wolves
node.nodeDescription:
Summons a primal wolf that follows you into combat. Resistant to powerful area attacks.

The wolf counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.

nodeList.description: Wolves have additional armor, and their attacks leech a portion of the physical damage they deal as health.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
Wolves have [100] additional armour per point

Wolves leech [4%] of physical damage as health per point

node.description:
You can have an additional wolf active at once.

You can have an additional companion active at once.

The extra wolf counts towards your companion limit.
Wolves have a chance to chill enemies.
node.nodeDescription: Wolves have [7%] chance to chill on hit

node.description: Wolves deal additional cold damage with attacks, and have an increased chance to stun enemies.
node.nodeDescription:
Wolves deals [2] additional cold damage per point with spells and melee attacks

Wolves have [20%] increased stun chance per point

node.description: Wolves deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).
node.nodeDescription: Wolves deal [15%] more damage per point (multiplicative with other bonuses).

node.loreText: Call to the forest and it will call back to you in the howls of the wolves
node.nodeDescription:
Summons a primal wolf that follows you into combat. Resistant to powerful area attacks.

The wolf counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.

node.description: Your wolves have a chance to retaliate with a {Lightning Strike} when hit, a spell that deals lightning damage to the attacking enemy.
node.nodeDescription: Your wolves have a [5%] chance per point to retaliate with a lightning strike when hit.

node.description: Wolves have increased health regeneration.
node.nodeDescription: Wolves have [60%] increased health regen per point

node.description: Your wolves have more health (multiplicative with other modifiers).
node.nodeDescription: Wolves have [15%] more health per point (multiplicative with other modifiers)

When you kill an enemy one of your wolves has a chance to {Howl}. This does not expend Howl's mana cost or put it on cooldown.

Howl also grants increased melee damage to all affected allies.

node.description: Wolves have a chance to chill enemies.
node.nodeDescription: Wolves have [7%] chance to chill on hit

node.description: Wolves have increased health regeneration.
node.nodeDescription: Wolves have [60%] increased health regen per point

node.description: Your wolves have more health (multiplicative with other modifiers).
node.nodeDescription: Wolves have [15%] more health per point (multiplicative with other modifiers)

node.loreText: Call to the forest and it will call back to you in the howls of the wolves
node.nodeDescription:
Summons a primal wolf that follows you into combat. Resistant to powerful area attacks.

The wolf counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.

node.description: Wolves have additional armor, and their attacks leech a portion of the physical damage they deal as health.
node.nodeDescription:
Wolves have [100] additional armour per point

Wolves leech [4%] of physical damage as health per point

nodeList.description: You can summon wolves up to your maximum number of companions.

node.altText: Recently refers to the past 4 seconds
node.description: Wolves have more damage and dodge rating (multiplicative with other modifiers). This bonus is tripled for wolves that have howled recently.
Wolves have increased attack and move speed.
node.nodeDescription: Wolves have [10%] increased attack speed and movement speed per point

node.loreText: Call to the forest and it will call back to you in the howls of the wolves
node.nodeDescription:
Summons a primal wolf that follows you into combat. Resistant to powerful area attacks.

The wolf counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.

node.description: Bleed inflicted by wolves lasts longer and wolves have a chance to slow on hit and when hit.
node.nodeDescription: Wolves gain [50%] more damage over time per point (multiplicative with other bonuses).

node.description: Wolves have a chance to cause enemies to bleed with their melee attacks.
node.nodeDescription: Wolves have [25%] chance per point to inflict bleeding on hit with melee attacks

node.description: Your wolves have additional dodge chance, and have increased dodge rating for each point of strength you have.
node.nodeDescription:
Your wolves have [30] additional dodge rating per point

Your wolves' dodge rating is increased by [3%] for each point of Strength

node.loreText: Call to the forest and it will call back to you in the howls of the wolves
node.nodeDescription:
Summons a primal wolf that follows you into combat. Resistant to powerful area attacks.

The wolf counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.

nodeList.description: Wolves have a chance to {Howl} on kill. This does not expend Howl's mana cost or put it on cooldown.

node.description: Wolves deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).
node.nodeDescription: Wolves deal [15%] more damage per point (multiplicative with other bonuses).

node.loreText: Call to the forest and it will call back to you in the howls of the wolves
node.nodeDescription:
Summons a primal wolf that follows you into combat. Resistant to powerful area attacks.

The wolf counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.

node.altText: {Haste} grants 30% increased movement speed. Does not stack.
node.description: Your wolves' howls also grant haste for a short duration.
Wolves have increased attack and move speed.
node.nodeDescription: Wolves have [10%] increased attack speed and movement speed per point
